ja508:10.1: pituhadayassa → hadayassa (bj), paddhagū → patthagū (sya1ed, sya2ed) | pattagū (mr)
ja508:12.3: Anipphannatā → anipphādāya (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | anipphannatāya (sya1ed, sya2ed) | ānipphādā (?)
ja508:13.2: Dvipadajaninda → dipadinda (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed), metaṃ → netaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | te taṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja508:14.1: Paṇhe → pañño (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | pañhe (sya1ed, sya2ed) | panhe (mr)
ja508:20.3: Devindassa gataṃ tadajja hatthaṃ → devindassa tadajja hatthagataṃ (mr)
